<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_cwf_wrkspc.CSMAIDisplayConstants</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Constants to display AI Icons, labels and banners on a form</description> <name>CSMAIDisplayConstants</name> <script><![CDATA[var CSMAIDisplayConstants = Class.create(); CSMAIDisplayConstants.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, type: 'CSMAIDisplayConstants' }; CSMAIDisplayConstants.IMPLEMENTATION_PLANS = { "AUTOFILL": "Autofill", "RECOMMENDATIONS": "Recommendations", "TEST": "Test" };
CSMAIDisplayConstants.UI_MESSAGES = { "BANNER": "Check fields predicted by AI for accuracy: " };
CSMAIDisplayConstants.UI_INFO = { 'ICON_NAME': "ai_sparkle_fill", 'ICON_VALUE': "AI", 'ICON_VARIANT_NAME': "tertiary", 'ICON_COLOR_NAME': "moderate", 'ICON_SHOW': "true", 'ICON_HIDE': "false", "SECTION_LABEL": "Top Recommendation(s)", "BANNER_PRIORITY": "moderate", "BANNER_ID": "ai_banner_csm" };
CSMAIDisplayConstants.PROP_UI_BANNER_ENABLED = "sn_cwf_wrkspc.ui.banner.enabled"; CSMAIDisplayConstants.UI_EXTENSION_POINT = "sn_cwf_wrkspc.CSMAIDisplay";]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-04 20:06:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>af8bfe06d9c5b910f8775f84af847ab8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CSMAIDisplayConstants</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="CSM and FSM Configurable Workspace Foundation" source="sn_cwf_wrkspc">27b568be53b11010d4f9ddeeff7b12c5</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="CSM and FSM Configurable Workspace Foundation">27b568be53b11010d4f9ddeeff7b12c5</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_af8bfe06d9c5b910f8775f84af847ab8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-13 00:00:37</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
